item.title: Beogram 4000: New Main Capacitor Array with Integrated Efficient 24V Power Supply
item.description:
The Beogram 4000 is known to get quite hot, primarily due to its outdated voltage regulator-based power supply. To address this, a modern PCB design with a buck converter-based 24V supply was created as a replacement for the original power supply and capacitors. The new design features high-quality Panasonic electrolytic capacitors, Samsung ceramic capacitors for the motor phase, and a buck converter for the 24V power supply. It’s designed to be easily installed in place of the original components...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beogram-4000-new-main-capacitor-array-with-integrated-efficient-24v-power-supply/

item.title: Altec Lansing introduces durable mobile accessories at CES
item.description:
Altec Lansing is launching new lines of durable chargers, power banks, cables, and cases for smartphones and tablets. Expected to be available around the second quarter of 2016, these accessories will have rugged features like IP67-rated, military-grade construction for waterproof, dustproof, and shock-resistant functionality and device protection. The new products will include: Altec Lansing Everything Proof Power Packs (3,000, 6,000, and 10,000 mAh): These power banks are designed for smartphones, tablets, and MP3 players, offering up to 100 hours of talk time, 75 hours of music, 50 hours of video, or 4...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/altec-lansing-introduces-durable-mobile-accessories-at-ces/

item.title: Beogram 4002 (5501): Repair of a Strange Fault Caused by a Shorted Diode D6
item.description:
During the restoration of a Beogram 4002 (5501) turntable, a peculiar control system issue persisted even after replacing the reservoir capacitors. Upon pressing START, the carriage would begin to move but halt after approximately 20 mm, coinciding with the lights turning off. A few seconds later, the lights would illuminate again, and the motor would operate at 45 RPM. In this state, the carriage could be moved using the » « buttons, but the arm lowering function was disabled...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beogram-4002-5501-repair-of-a-strange-fault-caused-by-a-shorted-diode-d6/

item.title: GP Batteries has created a unique powerbank for the SEA Games
item.description:
Source: GP Batteries. As the official battery partner for the SEA Games, GP Batteries has launched a limited-edition lithium-ion power bank to commemorate the upcoming games. This special power bank features a printed design of the 28th SEA Games Nila Logo and is officially recognized as an “Official Battery Partner” product. This power bank boasts a 10,400mAH capacity, making it perfect for charging smartphones and tablets. With two output ports, users can charge two devices concurrently while LED indicators display the remaining battery life...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/gp-batteries-has-created-a-unique-powerbank-for-the-sea-games/

item.title: Beocord 5000 (4715/4716): Recapping the Power Supply, Motor Control, Electronic Switch and Operational Control Boards
item.description:
The restoration continues! Today, I replaced the remaining electrolytic capacitors on my Beocord 5000 (4715/4716). New electrolytics bring peace of mind! The power supply board, including its reservoir and AC motor capacitors, along with the motor control, electronic switch, and operational control boards, were all addressed: The Motor Control board, responsible for the take-up motor, had only one Tantalum capacitor that needed replacement: Here it is after the replacement: Next is the Electronic Switch board...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beocord-5000-47154716-recapping-the-power-supply-motor-control-electronic-switch-and-operational-control-boards/

item.title: Holy Guacamole, It's Green Hosting
item.description:
The internet’s days of excessive energy consumption might be ending. Websites and online businesses contribute to environmental issues, but we can’t just abandon the technology we rely on. We need a more sustainable solution: eco-friendly hosting. The demand for electricity is increasing while clean energy sources are limited. Traditional power sources like coal are harmful, and even with reduced emissions, they still contribute to climate change. Renewable energy is becoming a viable solution...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/holy-guacamole-its-green-hosting/

item.title: The main focus of Kickstarter is iFind, which is powered by ambient electromagnetic radiation
item.description:
WeTag’s iFind tags use Bluetooth to connect with iOS or Android devices and don’t require charging. Like similar tracking devices, the tag is attached to an item and located using a smartphone. If the item goes out of range, the ‘Rope’ feature notifies the owner. The ‘UHelp’ feature leverages nearby phones to help find the lost object through Bluetooth. WeTag highlights a unique feature: shaking the iFind tag will cause the paired phone to vibrate...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-main-focus-of-kickstarter-is-ifind-which-is-powered-by-ambient-electromagnetic-radiation/

item.title: Duracell batteries provide six times the power
item.description:
Source: Duracell. To commemorate five decades of providing portable power, Duracell has partnered with TRANSFORMERS: AGE OF EXTINCTION, the fourth film in director Michael Bay’s globally recognized franchise, in a battle of good and evil. Duracell, the renowned battery manufacturer, is observing 50 years of providing portable power solutions. Although the traditional battery design remains largely unchanged, battery technology advancements have significantly extended battery life. Duracell’s latest CopperTop AA and AAA batteries, equipped with Duralock Power Preserve Technology, are ideal for devices like wireless mice and keyboards...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/duracell-batteries-provide-six-times-the-power/

item.title: Concentrating on Kickstarter: Making Solar Power Accessible to Everyone
item.description:
Spor Solar Charges aims to make convenient solar-powered battery charging accessible to everyone. Their product, Spor, is a portable battery charger for USB devices that can recharge itself using solar energy. It can also be powered up using a standard AC outlet. The company claims that Spor can charge multiple devices simultaneously and replenish a phone’s battery almost as quickly as a wall outlet, according to their Kickstarter page. Source: Kickstarter...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/concentrating-on-kickstarter-making-solar-power-accessible-to-everyone/
